business.headline: Sensex, Nifty extend positive streak, but IT and FMCG stocks limit market gainsThe S&P BSE Sensex gained 147.79 points to settle at 75,449.05, while the NSE Nifty50 added 73.30 points to close at 22,907.60.

REC shares rise after board clears 4th interim dividend for FY25. Check detailsREC Dividend: The company announced a dividend payout of Rs 3.6 per share, taking the total dividend declared so far in FY25 to Rs 15.4 per share.

Zomato shares surge over 4% as rally continues for 2nd day. What next?At 12:50 pm, shares of Zomato were up 4.12% to Rs 227.35 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). It may be noted that Zomato shares are rising despite the possibility that it could face an old insolvency plea.

PhysicsWallah IPO: Edtech firm files for Rs 4,600 crore public listingPhysicsWallah IPO: The edtech company has taken the confidential pre-filing route, a method that allows companies to submit their IPO documents to the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi) without making financial details public immediately.

SAIL shares jump 4% today as steel stocks gain. Should you buy?SAIL shares gained 4% during the intraday trading session, following a broad-based rally in steel stock prices. Read to find out if the company's stock is likely to gain further.

Missed Rs 5,000 SIP in top Nifty stocks 5 years ago? Returns may surprise youDespite the recent correction, a systematic investment plan (SIP) in top Nifty50 stocks over the past five years would have still delivered strong returns.

TCS, Infosys, HCLTech: Why major IT stocks are falling todayShares of TCS and Infosys dropped 2%, while other IT names like HCLTech, Tech Mahindra, LTIMindtree, and Coforge also traded in the red. The Nifty IT index, which had been gaining for the last three sessions, was the worst-performing sectoral index in morning trade.

Mishra Dhatu Nigam shares jump 7%. Why is defence PSU stock rising today?Mishra Dhatu Nigam stock price: At 10:36 am, Mishra Dhatu Nigam shares traded 6.27% higher at Rs 279 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE).

Hero MotoCorp sees mass exits, key senior executives step down: ReportNearly half a dozen top executives are believed to have stepped down in the past few days, with more exits likely in the coming weeks.

Vodafone Idea shares jump 4% after 5G launch in Mumbai. Check key detailsVodafone Idea share price today: Shares of the telecom company gained sharply during early trade after it announced the launch of 5G services in Mumbai.
Gold rates hit record high: Is this a good time to buy or book profit?On the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX), gold for April 4 contracts climbed 0.20% to an all-time high of Rs 88,890 per 10 grams.

SAIL, Tata Steel, JSW Steel, NMDC Steel: Why are steel stocks rising today?Steel stocks in focus: The rally came after the Directorate General of Trade Remedies (DGTR) suggested a 12% safeguard duty on specific steel imports for 200 days to protect local manufacturers from cheaper foreign steel.

Sensex, Nifty flat ahead of US Fed  policy outcome; Tata Steel, BPCL up 2%Stock market opening bell: The S&P BSE Sensex was up 32.28 points to 75,333.54 at 9:22 am, while the NSE Nifty50 rose 28.45 points to trade at 22,862.75.

Stock market opening today: Will Sensex, Nifty continue positive rally?Stock market opening on March 19: The benchmark indices are likely to open on a positive note, continuing their positive momentum.

Stocks to watch on March 19: Bajaj Auto, BPCL, Paytm, LIC, Zydus Life, GR InfraStocks to watch today: Bajaj Auto, BPCL, Paytm, Life Insurance Corporation of India are some of the top stocks that are likely to be in focus during today's trading session.

US stock market: Wall Street dips amid Fed uncertainty and Trump-Putin talksAt the opening bell, the S&P 500 fell 54.92 points, or 0.97%, to 5,620.20, Dow Jones Industrial Average lost 206.06 points, or 0.49%, to 41,635.57, and the Nasdaq Composite decreased 295.45 points, or 1.66%, to 17,513.21.

RBI assures IndusInd Bank customers: 'Bank's financial health remains stable'The RBI has advised depositors and investors not to react to unverified reports regarding IndusInd Bank and instead trust official statements and regulatory updates.

Bengaluru man says Rs 1.5 lakh/month not enough: 'Everything is super inflated'In a recent social media post, a Bengaluru resident mentioned that despite earning a good income, he and his fiancée still live in PG accommodation, unable to afford a decent rental space in the city's expensive housing market.

Sensex settles 1,100 points higher, Nifty above 22,800; Zomato surges 7%Stock market closing today: The S&P BSE Sensex settled 1131.31 points higher at 75,301.26, while the NSE Nifty50 closed over 325.55 points higher to 22,834.30.

Zomato stock price zooms 6% today despite reports of insolvency pleaZomato stock price: Despite the insolvency plea, Zomato shares have not been impacted. They were trading 6.03% higher at Rs 216.15 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). It had earlier reached an intraday high of Rs 216.50.

Online PF transfer claim rejected? How to apply againEPF claims can be turned down for multiple reasons. Hence, to avoid rejections, employees must carefully review and verify the details before submitting the claim form.

NPCI planning to stop 'collect calls'. Here's whyA collect call, or 'pull' transaction, allows merchants to initiate payment requests from customers. Still, fraudsters tend to exploit this mechanism for the purpose of deceiving others into paying for non-existent goods and services.

Explained: How India can shield itself from Donald Trump's tariff stormCan India escape the fallout of Trump's trade war, or will rising tariffs leave its economy exposed? Here is all you need to know.

Planning to buy land in Mumbai? See what $1 million gets youIn 2014, Rs 8 crore could get you 102 sq m of property in Mumbai, but in 2024, it bought only 99 sq m, according to Knight Frank's 'The Wealth Report'.

LIC hopes to decide on stake in health insurance company by March: ReportIf it enters the health space through a stake purchase, LIC will compete with the likes of Star Health Insurance, Aditya Birla Health Insurance, Niva Bupa Health Insurance and Care Health Insurance.

How EPF balance ensures financial security? 5 benefits to knowA sufficient EPF balance is a safety net in tough times. Though you cannot withdraw all the funds at any given point, you can partially withdraw them for certain needs such as a medical emergency, repayment of a home loan, higher studies, or to meet marriage expenses.

Explained: Why Ola Electric shares gained 14% today after hitting record lowOla Electric share price: The rise comes as investors seem to be buying the dip after yesterday's sharp fall. Trading volumes are higher today, supporting the stock's rebound.

LG Electronics India receives Sebi nod for IPO. Check key detailsThe IPO consists solely of an offer for sale (OFS) of up to 10.18 crore equity shares by parent company LG Electronics Inc. The face value of each share is Rs 10.
NMDC shares rise 2% after interim dividend announcement. Check detailsNMDC share price: At 11:15 am, NMDC share price was up 2% to Rs 66.26 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE).
Paytm shares surge 6% as subsidiary gets Sebi's research analyst certificateAt around 10:58 am, Paytm shares were up 5.39% to Rs 725.95 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE).

Sensex jumps 1,000 points to rise above 75,000. What investors need to knowStock market rally today: The S&P BSE Sensex jumped nearly 1,000 points in afternoon trade, crossing the 75,100 mark, while the Nifty 50 shot past 22,750. At 2:54 pm, the Sensex was up 990.66 points to 75,160.61, and the Nifty had gained 288.55 points, trading at 22,797.30.

Gold prices at record high: Will it keep rising in near future?Investors are flocking to gold as escalating trade tensions, U.S. tariff measures, and global uncertainties boost demand for the safe-haven asset. With prices soaring to record levels, the key question remains: Will gold continue its upward trajectory in the near future?

Sensex surges 1,000 points. Why is the stock market rising today?Stock market rally: By 2:44 pm, the Sensex was up 980.77 points at 75,150.72, while the Nifty gained 284.95 points to trade at 22,793.70. Banking, auto, and financial stocks led the rally, pushing benchmark indices higher.

Sensex, Nifty open higher as banking stocks rally; ICICI, Zomato lead gainsThe S&P BSE Sensex initially rose above 400 points and was trading 326.28 points higher at 74,496.23 at around 9:22 am. The NSE Nifty 50 also gained 107.50 points to trade above 22,600.

Bajaj to buy out Allianz's stake in insurance joint ventures after 24 yearsThe two firms have had a joint venture in the insurance sector for 24 years, and the partnership will officially come to an end once the first tranche of at least 6.1% is acquired and Allianz is reclassified from a promoter to an investor.
Stock market opening on March 17: Will Sensex, Nifty continue positive run?Stock market opening prediction on March 17: Sensex and Nifty are expected to open today's session on a positive note.

Looking for tax-saving options? Check out these 5 post office savings schemesAmong various tax-saving methods, post office savings schemes are considered one of the safest investment options since they are backed by the government.
Wall Street holds steadier following weeks of scary swingsThe S&P 500 was 0.1% higher after falling for four consecutive weeks amid Donald Trump's tariff threats to overseas markets.

'Stagflation' fears grow as US Fed prepares key interest rate decisionThe Federal Reserve faces rising inflation concerns and economic uncertainty ahead of its meeting. Potential stagflation complicates rate-cut plans, while higher tariffs and consumer inflation fears add pressure on policymakers and financial markets.

entertainment.headline: Param Singh on Ghum Hai...: Thought I might not be able to pull off Dr NeilActor Param Singh returned to television with a new role in Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin, marking a shift from his usual intense characters to the calm and composed persona of Dr Neil. In an exclusive interview with India Today Digital, he spoke about his initial nervousness and excitement about the opportunity and his focus on performing with honesty.

Anurag Kashyap 'frustrated' by 'morally corrupt' Netflix India, praises AdolescenceAnurag Kashyap has openly criticised Netflix's approach towards Indian content, calling it hypocritical. He praised the British series Adolescence, expressing envy over its daring storytelling.

Fe3O4 FORWARD album review: NMIXX's most ambitious release yetNMIXX pushes boundaries with their latest EP Fe3O4 FORWARD. Featuring a mix of genres and a collaboration with Indian choreographer Paramdeep Singh, the album showcases the group's evolution and daring creativity.

Sylvester Stallone's Tulsa King renewed for third seasonTulsa King fans rejoice as the hit crime drama gets the green light for a third season. The series, featuring Sylvester Stallone, has captivated with its gripping storyline and stellar cast.

Kanye West hits back at Playboi Carti's request to collaborate with daughter NorthRapper Kanye West was displeased with fellow rapper Playboi Carti's request to collaborate with his daughter, North West. He voiced his disapproval and reaffirmed his parental authority in a series of posts on X.

Kim Soo-hyun releases new statement on Kim Sae-ron row, denies any wrongdoingKorean star Kim Soo-hyun's team has released a new statement amid the ongoing controversy regarding his alleged involvement in actor Kim Sae-ron's death.

Pakistani actor Danish Taimoor invokes internet's wrath for comments on polygamyPakistani actor Danish Taimoor's recent comments on Islam and polygamy have upset the internet. His controversial take on the concept of having multiple wives has been gathering heat on social media.

Exclusive: Lex Scott Davis on Suits LA, comparisons with original, Harvey's cameoIn Suits LA, Lex Scott Davis plays the role of Erica, a confident woman in a male-dominated world. In an interview with us, Davis teases about Harvey Specter's return to the Suits world.

Suits LA: Harvey Specter is here, but what does his entry bring to the table?Suits LA Episode 4: Harvey Specter has entered the show. However, he is still not on the West Coast yet. How will this new twist bring more excitement to Aaron Korsh's spin-off?

Dupahiya director Sonam Nair on heartland stories, comparison with PanchayatDupahiya director Sonam Nair opens up about the setting of the Prime Video show, comparisons with Panchayat and more in an exclusive interaction.

Kanneda star Parmish Verma on the 'incident' that turned his life upside downActor-singer Parmish Verma spoke to India Today about the time he got shot by a gangster. Verma mentioned how such incidents make you step back and look at your life in a new light.

Shekhar Kapur slams OTT for Bandit Queen's edits: No one asked meFilmmaker Shekhar Kapur recently criticised his film, Bandit Queen's OTT edits. Shekhar wrote about how Indian filmmakers are no less than Western directors.

Jeet Adani on joining Shark Tank India: Don't want to change just 1–2 livesJeet Adani will join Shark Tank India as a mentor for the Devang Special week, focusing on businesses by differently-abled entrepreneurs. He will be joined by the visually impaired entrepreneur Srikanth Bolla.

Pankaj Tripathi says he's 'proud' as daughter Aashi makes debut in music videoPankaj Tripathi's daughter Aashi debuts in the music video Rang Daaro. The music video left her parents emotional. Pankaj called it a proud moment as Aashi began her acting journey.

Rapper Hanumankind meets 'GOAT' Virat Kohli at RCB unbox event. See picRapper Hanumankind recently met Virat Kohli at the RCB unbox event at the Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru. The rapper shared a picture from the special moment on social media.

Adolescence: Why everyone's talking about this mini-series on NetflixNetflix's Adolescence is earning rave reviews for its gripping one-shot storytelling and stellar performances. Critics and filmmakers like Hansal Mehta call it "next-level storytelling."

iHeartRadio Music Awards 2025: Taylor Swift dominates, Lady Gaga earns honourThe 2025 iHeartRadio Music Awards celebrated top artistes, with Taylor Swift dominating the voted categories. Lady Gaga received a special honour, adding to the night's excitement.

Hania Aamir, Farhan Saeed's Mere Humsafar back on TV: When, where to watchThe popular Pakistani romance drama Mere Humsafar, starring Hania Aamir and Farhan Saeed, is making a comeback. Find out when and where you can watch this beloved series.

Alka Yagnik reacts to Osama bin Laden being her fan: Is it my fault?Alka Yagnik's old interview reacting to Osama bin Laden being her fan has resurfaced. She also spoke about industry politics, revealing how she lost songs to senior singers. Her remarks are now viral.

general news.headline: Nagpur riots mastermind Fahim Khan arrested, caught on camera spreading rumoursPolice have named Fahim Khan as the mastermind of the Nagpur violence, alleging that his inflammatory speech triggered the clashes, leaving several injured and sparking large-scale unrest.

Decide Yuzvendra Chahal's divorce plea by tomorrow, High Court tells family courtThe Bombay High Court overturned a family court decision that denied the request to waive the statutory cooling-off period for the divorce of cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal and Dhanashree Verma. It directed the family court to decide the divorce petition by Thursday, March 20.

Aurangzeb not relevant today: RSS's big remark after Nagpur violence, tomb rowNagpur violence: Over 30 people were injured in the Nagpur clashes that broke out between two communities after right-wing outfits held a protest demanding the removal of Aurangzeb's tomb.

Sunita Williams's space marathon ends: Back home after 286 daysSunita Williams return: The astronauts, part of the Crew-9 mission, ended their spaceflight as they splashed down in the Atlantic Ocean having braved the challenging re-entry through Earth's atmosphere.

Watch: Dolphins are the surprise welcome crew for Sunita WilliamsDolphins greeted the Crew-9 astronauts as they splashed down in the Gulf Coast of Florida after a 17-hour-long journey from space. The Crew-9 mission includes Nasa astronauts Sunita Williams and Butch Wilmore, who have been in space for nine months.
Did Putin keep Trump waiting for an hour to discuss ceasefire? Video sparks buzzVladimir Putin reportedly kept Donald Trump waiting for an hour before their Ukraine ceasefire call.

Indian Green Card holders face deportation risk: Their rights and recourseGreen Card holders, including Indians, are facing never-before-seen scrutiny as the Trump administration walks the talk on citizenship, immigration and deportation. What are the rights of American Green Card holders, and what legal recourse do they have if they are threatened with deportation?

Woman kills husband with lover's help, hides chopped up body in cement-filled drumA Meerut woman, Muskan Rastogi, and her lover Sahil were arrested for murdering her husband, Saurabh Rajput, chopping off his body, and hiding it in a cement-filled drum.

Is Humanities still considered the poor cousin of Science in India? A 2019 survey on career awareness amongst Indian students found that 93% of those aged 14 to 21 knew only about seven career options across different streams, despite India offering over 250 job roles.

Indians deported, but Trump fields India-born lawyer to argue deportation ActAmid the executive-versus-judiciary battle in the US over deportations, the Donald Trump administration has fielded an India-born advocate to defend the use of the Alien Enemies Act of 1798 to deport illegal immigrants. Abhishek Kambli is a top official at the Department of Justice and grew up in a working-class family of immigrant Indians.

SpaceX Freedom, splashdown: Watch the moment Sunita Williams returned homeSunita Williams and Butch Wilmore safely returned to Earth off the Florida coast, ending a historic mission that extended from an initial eight days to nine months at the International Space Station.

French woman lured to Tamil Nadu hill with 'moksha' promise, sexually assaultedA French woman visiting Tamil Nadu was allegedly lured to a sacred hill under the pretext of attaining 'moksha' and sexually assaulted. After she filed a complaint, the police arrested a tourist guide in the case.

Madurai girl, 7, becomes world's youngest Taekwondo instructorSamyuktha Narayanan, who achieved the remarkable feat on August 14, 2024, started learning Taekwondo at the age of three and was trained by her father.

Will leave Rahul Gandhi red-faced: BJP as Shashi Tharoor praises PM Modi againPraising PM Modi for his diplomatic strategies for the second time in a month, Shashi Tharoor admitted he was wrong in opposing India's stand on the Ukraine war.

Sunita Williams returns to Earth: Health concerns that lay aheadLong-term trips to the ISS,  like the one Sunita Williams has taken, cause significant changes to the human body. We look at what lay ahead for the Crew-9 astronauts.

CBSE Class 12 Economics paper analysis: Well-balanced paper with moderate difficultyThe CBSE Class 12 Economics board exam paper was well-structured and moderately difficult, ensuring fairness for well-prepared students. Competency-based questions tested analytical and application skills.

In Elon Musk's shout-out to Trump on Sunita Williams's return, a dig at BidenIndian-origin Sunita Williams and Butch Wilmore were among four astronauts who touched down on Earth aboard Elon Musk-owned SpaceX's Dragon spacecraft earlier today.

Ukraine sees fresh strikes after Putin's call with Trump, Zelenskyy shares photoUkraine has accused Russia of rejecting a US-backed ceasefire proposal, citing renewed strikes on civilian infrastructure just hours after Putin's phone call with Trump.

What perseverance truly means: PM Modi welcomes back icon Sunita WilliamsPM Modi, in a heartfelt post on X, said the extended stay of the astronauts, Sunita Williams and Butch Wilmore, aboard the space station was a test of grit and courage.

Indian student cites 3 reasons why they 'regret' moving to Canada in Reddit post"I regret moving to Canada," read the title of the post shared on the r/Delhi subreddit in which they cited three major issues that international students face.

Karnataka MLA urges free liquor for men, Congress tells NDA to win and do soCiting Karnataka's welfare schemes for women, JD(S) MLA MT Krishnappa proposed two free liquor bottles for men in the state. His remarks sparked backlash from Congress leaders and women legislators.

Israel warns of more strikes as over 400 killed in Gaza after 2-month truceIsrael and Palestinian militant group Hamas accused each other of breaching the truce. It had broadly held since January and offered respite from war for the 2.3 million inhabitants of Gaza, which has been reduced to rubble.

Naga Chaitanya reveals one thing about Sobhita Dhulipala that melts himIt's been months since Naga Chaitanya and Sobhita Dhulipala got married in Hyderabad. In their first interview as a married couple, they opened up about their character traits that attract them to each other.

sports.headline: BCCI family policy won't change: Saikia reacts to Virat Kohli complaintThere will be no changes to the stricter SOPs that BCCI brought after the Border-Gavaskar series, said secretary Devajit Saikia on Wednesday, March 19. NBA Injury Updates: Celtics vs NetsThe Boston Celtics continue to manage the injury concerns as they prepare to face the Brooklyn Nets for the NBA regular game on Tuesday. According to the latest injury report, All-Star Jaylen Brown has been ruled out due to a knee injury, while fellow star Jayson Tatum is listed as questionable with a knee issue of his own.

Is Cam Thomas staying with the Nets? latest Free Agency and Injury UpdatesCam Thomas is expected to miss the remainder of the NBA regular season due to his third hamstring injury. This will decide how the Brooklyn Nets will approach the offseason, as the 23-year-old guard will enter the restricted free agency this summer.

Is Evan Mobley playing tonight? How to watch and NBA Injury Updates: Cavaliers vs. ClippersThe Cleveland Cavaliers prepare to face the Los Angeles Clippers on Tuesday, March 18, all eyes are on the injury status of star forward Evan Mobley. The team has officially listed him as questionable due to a right foot injury.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
